scripts.start: webpack && concurrently "tsc -p -w tsconfigumd.json" "tsc -p -w tsconfigumdjs.json" "scss src/sass/main.scss:demo/css/batman.css --watch" "scss demo/sass/main.scss:demo/css/main.css --watch" "webpack -w" "lite-server"
scripts.installglobalmodules: npm install typescript typedoc commitizen cz-conventional-changelog semantic-release-gitlab conventional-changelog-cli -g
scripts.setup: npm run installglobalmodules & npm install & npm link typescript & npm run docs & npm link typescript & npm start
scripts.build-core: webpack --config webpack.config.core.umd.js & npm pack ./dist/output/core & npm run move-tgz
scripts.build-components: webpack --config webpack.config.components.umd.js & npm pack ./dist/output/components & npm run move-tgz
scripts.move-tgz: npm run copy-tgz & npm run del-tgz
scripts.build-all: npm run pack-core & npm run pack-components & npm run move-tgz
